title: Creativity and Creative Problem-Solving
headline: Learn how to use your creativity to solve problems with the techniques provided in this free online self-help course.
description: ‘Problem-solving’ involves describing a problem, identifying its cause and finding solutions. This self-improvement course explains how to identify, define and classify challenges. We then provide techniques like brainstorming and mind-mapping to help you harness the power of your creativity to generate solutions. These skills will guide you past the obstacles in your path as you find creative new ways to see and solve problems.
courseDescription:
To solve any issue, one must first identify it, trace its origin, brainstorm possible solutions, evaluate them and then implement an action. We begin this course by studying the definitions of a ‘problem’ before explaining how to identify one. We then explain how to generate solutions and establish the benefits of understanding the problem-solving process.

The course then identifies various mental blocks and provides multiple tools to break them. Next, we will demonstrate how to generate ideas and solutions using mind maps to guide brainstorming. Finally, we will explain how to select and implement the right solution successfully. This course provides the tools you will need to identify problems in your working field and find their best solution.

This course offers an opportunity to master creative problem-solving. We provide practical ideas and techniques you can confidently use in your daily life. Creativity enables lateral thinking and lets you overcome mental blocks to help find solutions to problems that elude others, so sign up for this self-help course to harness your energy and power and explore the essentials of creative problem-solving techniques.
